how: Hold your mouse to blow and click escape to open the roblox menu and the same time then close it then let go
When opening a egg spam E or use tinytask to spam it for you
When collecting or auto hatching use your boosts!!
Most of the time, only use these when you find the 25x egg rift islands
In the zen island in the middle, there is a gem genie where you can get quests from and earn lots of gems
